PI_Feature1: Save here all your passwords, data or any information, forget paper notes and unprotected applications
PI_Feature2: Create your master password, only you will have access to your secrets with it
PI_Text1: First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You won't be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
PI_Subtitle2: What type of data can you save?
PI_Text2: For example, your card number, PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of any of your devices or any information you need to keep in a safe place.
PI_Data_Protection: I'm of legal age and I accept that my data will be processed according to the Data Protection Policy.
FORM_Description: First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. <1/> You won't be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
FORM_Description_2: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
FORM_Input_Label_3: Create a hint to remember your password (optional)
FORM_Password_Validation: The password must have between 8 and 24 characters, one number and one capital letter
Feedback_Ok_Title: Your Password Manager is already created!
Feedback_Ok_Text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut
Feedback_Ko_Text: We were unable to change your master password. Try again later.
